ygData.subject: Assasination Quest, please help!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail fellow Shadowknights , I wonder if you could give me some help on a quest ive been stuck on for weeks now. It is obtained in Freeport, after
ygData.messageBody:
Hail fellow Shadowknights <cackles etc>, I wonder if you could give me some
help on a quest ive been stuck on for weeks now. It is obtained in Freeport,
after completing the quest to kill the messenger from Qeynos, in W commons.
At first it was a quest to kill Lady Shae and retrive an artifact and give it
to the guy who set the quest. So i tried this... over and over. She was
tough, coned yellow and had charm. I notched up 6 to 7 kills on her working
with groups (died a fair few times too). Mucho effort. She never dropped the
artifact. I kept at it killing her a futher few times, petitioned at least
twice and was only told the quest wasnt broken to keep trying she should drop
it. (kinda ruined the feeling of going and assasinating someone when i have
to do it 10 time). Through all this im totally ruining my faction with the
high elves. I mean im taking a BIG faction hit with each kill. Anyuways i
stopped playing for a while. I came back this week and re did the W commons
messenger quest. I then found the Shae one had changed. It now says she has
something called the Bayle List, which she is taking back to qeynos soon. She
now also cons blue and doesnt have charm - i can easily solo her. So ive
stuck at it, killing her she still dont drop it, me faction is now ruined
with high elves. If someone she dont kos asks her about it she says she'd
"have to be dancing with pink mamoths bfore she talks about antonious Bayle".
SOOO i tried getting her drunk with a mule, still no luck. Ive searched her
room after getting rid of her bodyguard, no list, if anyone has done this
quest or knows of the Bayle List, PLEEEEEASE help me!!!!

Jorval, Level 14 Human ShadowKnight
Cazic Thule

P.s This post has not been proofread!
